plugin-package.name: Greeny blu Theme
plugin-package.short-description: Greeny blue compose of green, black , blue colours. Change the image however you like. But I suggest you replace the image with a greeny picture. The zip has the source code as well with .PSD Photoshop file and the main html/css files.
plugin-package.change-log: Adapted to the latest version of Liferay.
plugin-package.author: heartlessg
